title: Google\Cloud\Batch\V1\TaskGroup
name: TaskGroup
description:
A TaskGroup contains one or multiple Tasks that share the same Runnable but with different runtime parameters.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.batch.v1.TaskGroup

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. TaskGroup name. The system generates this field based on parent Job name. For example: "projects/123456/locations/us-west1/jobs/job01/taskGroups/group01".

params.name: data.task_spec
params.description: Required. Tasks in the group share the same task spec.

params.name: data.task_count
params.description: Number of Tasks in the TaskGroup. default is 1

params.name: data.parallelism
params.description: Max number of tasks that can run in parallel. Default to min(task_count, 1000).

params.name: data.task_environments
params.description: An array of environment variable mappings, which are passed to Tasks with matching indices. If task_environments is used then task_count should not be specified in the request (and will be ignored). Task count will be the length of task_environments. Tasks get a BATCH_TASK_INDEX and BATCH_TASK_COUNT environment variable, in addition to any environment variables set in task_environments, specifying the number of Tasks in the Task's parent TaskGroup, and the specific Task's index in the TaskGroup (0 through BATCH_TASK_COUNT - 1). task_environments supports up to 200 entries.

params.name: data.task_count_per_node
params.description: Max number of tasks that can be run on a VM at the same time. If not specified, the system will decide a value based on available compute resources on a VM and task requirements.

params.name: data.require_hosts_file
params.description: When true, Batch will populate a file with a list of all VMs assigned to the TaskGroup and set the BATCH_HOSTS_FILE environment variable to the path of that file. Defaults to false.

params.name: data.permissive_ssh
params.description: When true, Batch will configure SSH to allow passwordless login between VMs running the Batch tasks in the same TaskGroup.

methods.name: getTaskEnvironments
methods.description:
An array of environment variable mappings, which are passed to Tasks with matching indices. If task_environments is used then task_count should not be specified in the request (and will be ignored). Task count will be the length of task_environments.

Tasks get a BATCH_TASK_INDEX and BATCH_TASK_COUNT environment variable, in addition to any environment variables set in task_environments, specifying the number of Tasks in the Task's parent TaskGroup, and the specific Task's index in the TaskGroup (0 through BATCH_TASK_COUNT - 1). task_environments supports up to 200 entries.

Generated from protobuf field repeated .google.cloud.batch.v1.Environment task_environments = 9;

Generated from protobuf field repeated .google.cloud.batch.v1.Environment task_environments = 9;
